Name: Left Hook
Flavor: The Hekaton clenches its mighty fist.
Targeting: Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.

Name: Right Hook
Flavor: The Hekaton clenches its mighty fist.
Targeting: Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.

Name: One, Two Punch
Flavor: A fist jabs at you from the left, immediately followed by a right cross.
Targeting: Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.

Name: Thunderpunch
Flavor: The Hekaton rears on its hind arms and delivers a powerful downward blow.
Targeting: Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Fate 3+ Pushback 3. Each hit deals 1 Danger. WoO Knockdown.

Name: Cold Open
Flavor: It goes from zero to ten in a heartbeat and the punches keep on coming.
Targeting: Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.

Name: Smash
Flavor: The Hekaton smashes his front hands as if with frustration.
Targeting: Priority Target in range. Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.

Name: Omnipunch
Flavor: As if it was a sea urchin, the Primordial extends all of its limbs in every direction, punching everything at arms' length.
Targeting: All adjacent Titans. No Target: Perform Signature.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deals 1 Danger. Fate 4+ 2 Danger instead. WoO Knockback 5.

Name: Furious Smash
Flavor: The Primordial delivers a blow with its mighty armored fist.
Targeting: Priority Target in range. Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deals 1 Danger. Fate 4+ 2 Danger instead.

Name: Rumble Strike
Flavor: The Hekaton starts smashin the ground in a rhythmic fashion.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deals 1 Danger. WoO Knockdown.

Name: Chainfist
Flavor: The monster cartwheels into you like a giant ball of fists and pain.
Targeting: Priority Target in range. Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
After Attack Effects: If Danger was dealt, repeat Chainfist (once).

Name: Suckerpunch
Flavor: It knows where it hurts the most.
Targeting: Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deals 2 Danger. Fate 5+ 3 Danger instead. WoO Knockdown.

Name: Solarplexar
Flavor: Somehow the creature understands your connection to the Titan and attacks the most vulnerable neural plexus.
Targeting: Priority Target in range. Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deals 2 Danger. WoO Knockdown.
After Attack Effects: If 2+ Danger was dealt, draw a Kratos card.

Name: Death From A Hundred Fists
Flavor: Mindless and unrelentless, it comes at you with all of its might. You may endure one, two, ten punches. One hundred is madness.
Targeting: Priority Target in range. Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Roll as many additional Evasion Dice as there are hits. Repeat until there are no hits. Then each hit deals 1 Danger. Fate 6+ 2 Danger Instead.

Name: Thunderclash
Flavor: The Hekaton winds around, almost turning to you with its side. Then the hook comes knocking.
Targeting: Priority Target in range. Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deals 3 Danger. Fate 6+ 4 Danger instead. WoO Knockdown.

Name: Backbreaker
Flavor: One of the mighty front hands bends inwards, almost as if the Hekaton was kneeling. The other hands raise you in the air, then slam down.
Targeting: Priority Target in range. Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Fate 8+ You Die. If you didn't die, each hit deals 2 Danger, then draw an Obol instead of a regular Trauma Draw.

Name: Solarsuplexar
Flavor: It knows you're just controlling the Titan and it intends to break that connection - with flair.
Targeting: Priority Target in range. Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deals 1 Danger. WoO Forced Vault. WoO Knockdown.
After Attack Effects: If Danger was dealt, draw a Kratos card.

Name: Skullcrusher
Flavor: The mighty hands of the monster clutch your helmeted head and squeeze. The screech of metal is deafening.
Targeting: Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deal 4 danger. WoO Knockdown.

Name: Hekatosmasher
Flavor: The Primordial moves all its weight onto one side and delivers the mother of all haymakers.
Attack Consequences: Each hit deals 2 Danger. WoO Knockdown. WoO Fate 5+ Knockback 5.

Name: Swat
Flavor: The Hekaton does what it was made to do: SMASH!
Targeting: Closest Titan in front, in range. Closest Titan in sight.
